content_old: 16 So that he who blesseth himself in the earth Will bless himself in the God of faithfulness, And he who sweareth in the earth Will swear by the God of faithfulness,— Because the former troubles have been forgotten, and Because they are hid from mine eyes.

content: 17 For､ behold me! Creating new heavens､ and a new earth,— And the former shall not be mentioned, neither shall they come up on the heart.
content_old: 17 For､ behold me! Creating new heavens､ and a new earth,— And the former shall not be mentioned, neither shall they come up on the heart.

content: 18 But joy ye and exult､ perpetually､ in what I am about to create,— For､ behold me! Creating Jerusalem an exultation､ and Her People a joy;
content_old: 18 But joy ye and exult､ perpetually､ in what I am about to create,— For､ behold me! Creating Jerusalem an exultation､ and Her People a joy;

content: 19 Therefore will I Exult in Jerusalem､ and Joy in my People,— And there shall be heard in her no more The sound of weeping､ or the sound of a cry:
content_old: 19 Therefore will I Exult in Jerusalem､ and Joy in my People,— And there shall be heard in her no more The sound of weeping､ or the sound of a cry:

content: 20 There shall be thenceforward no more A suckling of a few days､ or an elder Who filleth not up his days,— But a youth､ a hundred years old may die, Yea a sinner､ a hundred years old shall be accused.
content_old: 20 There shall be thenceforward no more A suckling of a few days､ or an elder Who filleth not up his days,— But a youth､ a hundred years old may die, Yea a sinner､ a hundred years old shall be accused.

content: 21 Then shall they build houses､ and dwell in them,— And plant vineyards､ and eat the fruit of them;
content_old: 21 Then shall they build houses､ and dwell in them,— And plant vineyards､ and eat the fruit of them;

content: 22 They shall not build､ and another dwell, They shall not plant､ and another eat,— For as the days of a tree shall be the days of my people, And the work of their own hands shall my chosen ones use to the full:
content_old: 22 They shall not build､ and another dwell, They shall not plant､ and another eat,— For as the days of a tree shall be the days of my people, And the work of their own hands shall my chosen ones use to the full:

content: 23 They shall not labour in vain, Nor have children for terror,— For the seed of the blessed ones of Yahweh shall they be, And their offspring､ with them.
content_old: 23 They shall not labour in vain, Nor have children for terror,— For the seed of the blessed ones of Yahweh shall they be, And their offspring､ with them.

content: 24 And it shall come to pass— That before they call I will answer, And while yet they are speaking I will hear.
content_old: 24 And it shall come to pass— That before they call I will answer, And while yet they are speaking I will hear.

content: 1 Thus saith Yahweh, The heavens are my throne, and The earth is my footstool: Where then is the house which ye can build me? Or where is my place of rest?
content_old: 1 Thus saith Yahweh, The heavens are my throne, and The earth is my footstool: Where then is the house which ye can build me? Or where is my place of rest?

content: 2 For all these things hath mine own hand made, And all these things came into being,— Declareth Yahweh. But for this one will I look around, For him who is humbled and smitten in spirit, And so careth anxiously for my word.
content_old: 2 For all these things hath mine own hand made, And all these things came into being,— Declareth Yahweh. But for this one will I look around, For him who is humbled and smitten in spirit, And so careth anxiously for my word.

content: 3 He that slaughtered an ox is as one who smiteth a man, He that sacrificeth a lamb is as one who beheadeth a dog, He that causeth a meal-offering to ascend offereth it with the blood of swine, He that maketh a memorial of frankincense is as one who blesseth iniquity: They indeed have chosen their own ways, And in their own abominations their soul hath found delight;
content_old: 3 He that slaughtered an ox is as one who smiteth a man, He that sacrificeth a lamb is as one who beheadeth a dog, He that causeth a meal-offering to ascend offereth it with the blood of swine, He that maketh a memorial of frankincense is as one who blesseth iniquity: They indeed have chosen their own ways, And in their own abominations their soul hath found delight;

content: 4 I､ also will choose the things that vex them､ And the things they dread will I bring upon them, Because— I called､ and there was none to answer, I spake､ and they hearkened not,— But did that which was wicked in mine eyes, And of that wherein I delighted not made choice.
content_old: 4 I､ also will choose the things that vex them､ And the things they dread will I bring upon them, Because— I called､ and there was none to answer, I spake､ and they hearkened not,— But did that which was wicked in mine eyes, And of that wherein I delighted not made choice.

content: 5 Hear the word of Yahweh､ ye who care anxiously for his word: Said your brethren Who hated you､ Who thrust you out for my Name’s Sake, Yahweh be glorified! Therefore shall he appear to your rejoicing, But they shall turn pale.
content_old: 5 Hear the word of Yahweh､ ye who care anxiously for his word: Said your brethren Who hated you､ Who thrust you out for my Name’s Sake, Yahweh be glorified! Therefore shall he appear to your rejoicing, But they shall turn pale.

content: 6 The sound of a tumult—out of the city, A sound､ out of the temple,— The sound of Yahweh､ rendering recompense to his foes.
content_old: 6 The sound of a tumult—out of the city, A sound､ out of the temple,— The sound of Yahweh､ rendering recompense to his foes.

content: 7 Before she travaileth she hath brought forth,— Before her pains come to her she hath given birth to a man-child!
content_old: 7 Before she travaileth she hath brought forth,— Before her pains come to her she hath given birth to a man-child!

content: 8 Who hath heard the like of this? Who hath seen the like of these things? Can a land be made to bring forth in one day? Or a nation be born at one time? As soon as she travaileth Zion hath also given birth to her children.
content_old: 8 Who hath heard the like of this? Who hath seen the like of these things? Can a land be made to bring forth in one day? Or a nation be born at one time? As soon as she travaileth Zion hath also given birth to her children.

content: 9 Could I bring to the birth､ and not cause to bring forth? Saith Yahweh. Or I be causing to bring forth､ and then prevent? Saith thy God.
content_old: 9 Could I bring to the birth､ and not cause to bring forth? Saith Yahweh. Or I be causing to bring forth､ and then prevent? Saith thy God.

content: 10 Rejoice ye with Jerusalem､ and exult over her��� All ye who love her,— Joy with her､ right joyfully, All ye who used to mourn over her:
content_old: 10 Rejoice ye with Jerusalem､ and exult over her��� All ye who love her,— Joy with her､ right joyfully, All ye who used to mourn over her:

content: 11 That ye may draw､ to satisfaction､ out of the fountain of her consolations,— That ye may drain out and get exquisite delight from the abundance of her glory.
content_old: 11 That ye may draw､ to satisfaction､ out of the fountain of her consolations,— That ye may drain out and get exquisite delight from the abundance of her glory.

content: 12 For thus saith Yahweh,— Behold me! extending unto her､ like a river prosperity, And as a torrent over flowing the glory of the nations､ That ye may draw it forth,— Upon the side shall ye be carried, and Upon the knees shall ye be caressed:
content_old: 12 For thus saith Yahweh,— Behold me! extending unto her､ like a river prosperity, And as a torrent over flowing the glory of the nations､ That ye may draw it forth,— Upon the side shall ye be carried, and Upon the knees shall ye be caressed:

content: 13 As one whom his mother consoleth So will I console you, And in Jerusalem shall ye be consoled.
content_old: 13 As one whom his mother consoleth So will I console you, And in Jerusalem shall ye be consoled.

content: 14 As soon as ye have seen it your heart shall be joyful, And your bones like green herbage shall thrive,— So shall be known The hand of Yahweh with his servants, But indignation with his foes!
content_old: 14 As soon as ye have seen it your heart shall be joyful, And your bones like green herbage shall thrive,— So shall be known The hand of Yahweh with his servants, But indignation with his foes!

content: 15 For lo! Yahweh with fire doth come, And like a storm-wind are his chariots,— To render､ with fury､ his anger, And his rebuke､ with flames of fire.
content_old: 15 For lo! Yahweh with fire doth come, And like a storm-wind are his chariots,— To render､ with fury､ his anger, And his rebuke､ with flames of fire.

content: 16 For by fire will Yahweh enter into judgment, And by his sword､ with all flesh,— And many shall be the slain of Yahweh.
content_old: 16 For by fire will Yahweh enter into judgment, And by his sword､ with all flesh,— And many shall be the slain of Yahweh.

content: 17 They who hallow themselves and purify themselves for the gardens､ Behind a certain thing in the midst, Who eat the flesh of swine､ and the abomination､ and the mouse Together shall be cut off— Declareth Yahweh.
content_old: 17 They who hallow themselves and purify themselves for the gardens､ Behind a certain thing in the midst, Who eat the flesh of swine､ and the abomination､ and the mouse Together shall be cut off— Declareth Yahweh.

content: 18 Because I … for their works and their devices doth it come!… Am about to gather together all nations and tongues,— So shall they come､ and see my glory.
content_old: 18 Because I … for their works and their devices doth it come!… Am about to gather together all nations and tongues,— So shall they come､ and see my glory.

content: 19 Then will I set､ among them､ a sign, And will send､ of them､ such as have escaped､ unto the nations— Tarshish､ Pul､ and Lud､ that draw the bow, Tubal and Javan,— The Coastlands that are afar off､ Who have not heard my fame､ Nor seen my glory, And they shall tell my glory throughout the nations.
content_old: 19 Then will I set､ among them､ a sign, And will send､ of them､ such as have escaped､ unto the nations— Tarshish､ Pul､ and Lud､ that draw the bow, Tubal and Javan,— The Coastlands that are afar off､ Who have not heard my fame､ Nor seen my glory, And they shall tell my glory throughout the nations.

content: 20 Then shall they bring in all your brethren out of all the nations､ As a present unto Yahweh, Upon horses and in chariots and in palanquins and on mules and on dromedaries､ Unto my holy mountain—Jerusalem､ Saith Yahweh,— Just as the sons of Israel bring in their present in a pure vessel､ into the house of Yahweh.
content_old: 20 Then shall they bring in all your brethren out of all the nations､ As a present unto Yahweh, Upon horses and in chariots and in palanquins and on mules and on dromedaries､ Unto my holy mountain—Jerusalem､ Saith Yahweh,— Just as the sons of Israel bring in their present in a pure vessel､ into the house of Yahweh.

content: 21 And of them also will I take for priests—for Levites､ Saith Yahweh,
content_old: 21 And of them also will I take for priests—for Levites､ Saith Yahweh,

content: 22 For as the new heavens and the new earth which I am about to make､ are to remain before me Declareth Yahweh. So shall remain your seed and your name.
content_old: 22 For as the new heavens and the new earth which I am about to make､ are to remain before me Declareth Yahweh. So shall remain your seed and your name.

content: 23 And it shall come to pass, that From one new moon to another, and From one sabbath to another Shall all flesh come in to bow down before me.､ Saith Yahweh.
content_old: 23 And it shall come to pass, that From one new moon to another, and From one sabbath to another Shall all flesh come in to bow down before me.､ Saith Yahweh.
